# HKWorkoutSessionState.prepared

**Case**

The session is ready but not yet running.

## Declaration

```swift
case prepared
```

## Discussion

The app can continue to run in the background, even after the user lowers their wrist, but it doesn’t yet generate workout data.

## Related Documentation

- **prepare()**: Prepares the workout session.

## Session states

- **HKWorkoutSessionState.notStarted**: The workout session has not started.
- **HKWorkoutSessionState.running**: The workout session is running.
- **HKWorkoutSessionState.paused**: The workout session has paused.
- **HKWorkoutSessionState.stopped**: The session has stopped.
- **HKWorkoutSessionState.ended**: The workout session has ended.

items.description: The workout session has not started.
